transcription_link: Directoffice AB-Remote Helpers - 2025/08/21 13:53 EEST - Notes by Gemini
email_content:
Dear Mårten,

Thank you for the call today—it was a pleasure speaking with you.

As discussed, I've attached our company presentation summarizing our services and a sample of our standard agreement. You can also explore more about Remote Helpers and view video CVs of our candidates on our website: https://rh-s.com.

To summarize, we presented Remote Helpers' services, highlighting our expertise in lead generation, sales, web development, and project support. Our team works remotely from Ukraine with structured onboarding and flexible resource management.

You are looking for IT and web development support, including a redesigned website with integrated news, newsletter tools, and an event booking system, along with re-engineering the site structure and managing small to larger multi-month projects. For lead generation, you want ongoing LinkedIn support to maintain a steady flow of leads while your internal team focuses on delivery. In graphic design, you need designers for website and visual content, ensuring alignment with your brand and marketing efforts.

We've also included a sample of our agreement for your review.

Best regards,
